data.comment: The match has started at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Metz.
In the minute 1, Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Metz to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Metz in the half of Lens.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 6, Issiaga Sylla (Lens) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
In the minute 7, Amaury Delerue awards the home team a throw-in.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Metz.
Corner awarded to Metz.
In the minute 9, Metz apply pressure and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Kiki but the ball hits the post!
Metz are coming forward and Opa Nguette gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Lens at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 10, Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Free kick Lens.
Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
In the minute 15, Amaury Delerue signals a Lens throw-in in Metz's half.
Lens's Florian Sotoca gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Metz defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
In the minute 20, Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Metz in Metz.
Corner awarded to Metz.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
Amaury Delerue signals a throw-in for Metz, close to Lens's area.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Lens.
Lens needs to be cautious. Metz have an attacking throw-in.
Metz have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 25, Can Metz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lens's half?
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a Lens throw-in in Metz's half.
In the minute 30, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Opa Nguette.
Great play from Farid Boulaya to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Metz.
In the minute 33, Metz drive upfield and Dylan Bronn gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lens defender.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
John Boye (Metz) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 34, Lens have a goal kick.
Amaury Delerue awards the away team a throw-in.
In Metz Metz attack through Pape Ndiaga Yade. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 35, Amaury Delerue awards Lens a goal kick.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
The match at Stade Saint Symphorien has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jonathan Gradit, who is down injured.
In the minute 39, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
Lens to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Lens in Metz.
Jonathan Gradit is back on his feet again.
In the minute 42, Attention is being given to Metz’s Dylan Bronn and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Metz.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half has started at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Metz's Dylan Bronn is back in action after a slight knock.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Metz.
Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 49, Habib Maiga gets his shot on target but fails to score for Metz.
At Stade Saint Symphorien, Farid Boulaya has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Amaury Delerue signals a Lens throw-in in Metz's half.
In the minute 50, Can Lens capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
Amaury Delerue awards Lens a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Metz.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
In the minute 54, Amaury Delerue waits before resuming play because Pape Ndiaga Yade for Metz is still down.
The away team have replaced Issiaga Sylla with Seko Fofana. This is the first substitution made today by Franck Haise.
Metz’s Pape Ndiaga Yade is on his feet again at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Metz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 59, In Metz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gael Kakuta (Lens) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in Metz.
In the minute 62, Lens to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Lens push forward at Stade Saint Symphorien and Gael Kakuta gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Metz defence.
Seko Fofana for Lens gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 62, Metz have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Metz have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 64, Florian Sotoca of Lens gets in a strike, but is off target.
Metz have a goal kick.
Metz are pushing forward but Pape Ndiaga Yade's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 65, Amaury Delerue awards Lens a goal kick.
Seko Fofana for Lens drives towards goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick Lens.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Lens in the half of Metz.
In the minute 68, Metz needs to be cautious. Lens have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
Thomas Delaine of Metz smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Metz.
Lens to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Cheick Oumar Doucoure (Lens) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 70, Lens's Cheick Oumar Doucoure gets in a shot on goal at Stade Saint Symphorien. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Amaury Delerue signals a Lens throw-in in Metz's half.
Vagner is replacing Pape Ndiaga Yade for Metz at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 74, Franck Haise (Lens) is making a second substitution, with Arnaud Kalimuendo replacing Cheick Oumar Doucoure.
Corentin Jean is replacing Gael Kakuta for the away team.
Can Lens capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Metz's half?
In the minute 75, Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
In the minute 80, Lens drives forward and Corentin Jean gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Metz.
Goal kick for Lens at Stade Saint Symphorien.
In the minute 82, Lens drive upfield and Florian Sotoca gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Metz defender.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Lens's Florian Sotoca gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the home team in Metz.
Frederic Antonetti is making the team's second substitution at Stade Saint Symphorien with Thierry Ambrose replacing Opa Nguette.
Franck Haise (Lens) is making a fourth substitution, with Simon Banza replacing Jonathan Clauss.
In the minute 84, Tony Mauricio is on a sub for Yannick Cahuzac for Lens.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Metz.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 86, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Amaury Delerue awards the home team a throw-in.
In Metz Metz attack through Farid Boulaya. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 87, Amaury Delerue awards Lens a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Lens.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Lens advance rapidly upfield but Amaury Delerue blows for offside.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Metz.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Lens's Seko Fofana misses with an attempt on goal.
Metz have a goal kick.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Metz close to the penalty box.
Amaury Delerue blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
Florian Sotoca (Lens) has received a yellow card from Amaury Delerue.
It's now 2-0 in Metz as Farid Boulaya scores for Metz.
Thomas Delaine with an assist there.
